_space_group_HM_name.name: _space_group_HM_name
_space_group_HM_name.description: Hermann-Mauguin symbols given in Table 4.3.2.1 of International Tables for Crystallography Vol. A (2002) or a Hermann-Mauguin symbol for a conventional or unconventional setting.

length_a.name: length_a
length_a.description: Unit-cell length of the selected structure in angstroms.

length_b.name: length_b
length_b.description: Unit-cell length of the selected structure in angstroms.

length_c.name: length_c
length_c.description: Unit-cell length of the selected structure in angstroms.

angle_alpha.name: angle_alpha
angle_alpha.description: Unit-cell angle of the selected structure in degrees.

angle_beta.name: angle_beta
angle_beta.description: Unit-cell angle of the selected structure in degrees.

angle_gamma.name: angle_gamma
angle_gamma.description: Unit-cell angle of the selected structure in degrees.

_space_group_HM_name.name: _space_group_HM_name
_space_group_HM_name.description: Hermann-Mauguin symbols given in Table 4.3.2.1 of International Tables for Crystallography Vol. A (2002) or a Hermann-Mauguin symbol for a conventional or unconventional setting.

label.name: label
label.description: A unique identifier for a particular site in the crystal

occupancy.name: occupancy
occupancy.description: The fraction of the atom type present at this site.

fract_x.name: fract_x
fract_x.description: Atom-site coordinate as fractions of the unit cell length.

fract_y.name: fract_y
fract_y.description: Atom-site coordinate as fractions of the unit cell length.

fract_z.name: fract_z
fract_z.description: Atom-site coordinate as fractions of the unit cell length.

Uiso.name: Uiso
Uiso.description: The standard anisotropic atomic displacement components in angstroms squared which appear in the structure-factor term.

msp_type.name: msp_type
msp_type.description: A standard code used to describe the type of magnetic susceptibility parameters used for the site.

chi_11.name: chi_11
chi_11.description: The standard anisotropic magnetic susceptibility components in inverse teslas which appear in the structure-factor term.

chi_12.name: chi_12
chi_12.description: The standard anisotropic magnetic susceptibility components in inverse teslas which appear in the structure-factor term.

chi_13.name: chi_13
chi_13.description: The standard anisotropic magnetic susceptibility components in inverse teslas which appear in the structure-factor term.

chi_22.name: chi_22
chi_22.description: The standard anisotropic magnetic susceptibility components in inverse teslas which appear in the structure-factor term.

chi_23.name: chi_23
chi_23.description: The standard anisotropic magnetic susceptibility components in inverse teslas which appear in the structure-factor term.

chi_33.name: chi_33
chi_33.description: The standard anisotropic magnetic susceptibility components in inverse teslas which appear in the structure-factor term.
